titleEN: New York City Skyline Wall Mural
content: Stay close to your beloved city at all times by decorating your home with the New York City skyline wall mural. This stunning mural displays a remarkably beautiful scene that perfectly captures the essence of the city that never sleeps.

Lumberjack and ninja forces have combined to bring you the folding saw. This katana-styled saw conveniently folds to decrease the risk of injury and also make it more portable. When you’re ready to do work, just bust open the 19.7″ blade and git-er-done.

Create scenes of pure terror in your next amateur film project with the horrified B-movie victims playset. You’ll have 9 colorful and absolutely horrified victims at your disposal, each ready to run away from whatever monster is wrecking havoc on them.

Cook up delicious meals the entire family will drool over with the mac and cheese cookbook. Now you’ll be able to take your favorite comfort food and learn how to prepare it in 50 succulent ways. Your waistline will not thank you.

Liven up your drab mornings with a little whimsy provided by the giraffe ceramic mug. Hand painted with a 3D giraffe neck handle, the mug’s wacky design can put a smile on anyone’s face and might even help ignite your imagination at work.

Solving a regular Rubik’s cube will seem like child’s play when you take on the advanced Rubik’s cube. This significantly more complicated toy truly tests your intelligence and patience. If you fancy yourself a cerebral stud, then this is the puzzle for you.

Convert almost any outdoor environment into your personal napping area with the hammock backpack. This backpack is fully functional for storing your gear while also featuring a built in hammock you can pull out to create an impromptu nap spot.

Surprise your co-workers with the middle finger when you sneak this offensive coffee cup into the break room cup cabinet. Disguised as an every day white ceramic mug, the interior contains a little surprise that pops up to say hello after the coffee is all gone.

Turn your campsite into a device charging station with the biolite basecamp stove. This handy grill gives food the classic wood fire taste without the smoke, while also converting the heat into usable electricity, so you can charge your smartphone, GPS device, etc.

Use the force to stay dry during rainstorms with the lightsaber umbrella. Each officially licensed umbrella features a lightsaber like handle complemented by a radiant anodized blue shaft so you’re always ready to do battle against mother nature’s fury.

Improve the production value of your homemade <del>porn</del> movies with aid from the GoPro smartphone mount. The device allows you to mount both your phone and GoPro simultaneously, so you can get two completely different shots at the same time.

Turn any wall in your home into an impromptu shoe closet with the horizontal shoe rack. The unique, minimalist design of the shoe rack allows you to store shoes horizontally – and most importantly, off the dirty floor.

Set yourself apart from every other artist by making your creations come alive at night with luminescent spray paint. While all other art lies dormant at night, your masterpiece will take center stage as the only visible art able to be seen without a stage light.

titleEN: Mini Weapons Of Mass Destruction Book
content: Reign supreme over the other cubicles with help from the “Mini Weapons of  Mass Destruction” book. With this handy book at your disposal, you’ll turn everyday objects like paper clips and ball point pens into weapons of pure devastation.

titleEN: Crazy Cat Lady Action Figure Set
content: Give the ultimate gift for the crazy cat lady in your life with this incredibly realistic action figure set. Included with your purchase of this wild eyed figurine are six toy cats – not counting the cats perched on the figurine’s shoulders and hiding in her robe pocket.

Ensure your pup stays afloat as they hang ten with the doggy life vest. This high performance life vest – designed for smaller breeds – allows your dog a wide range of mobility while also featuring an ergonomic handle so you can easily scoop him up.

Stay cool during the hottest of days by laying out next to the flexible misting hose. The colorful attachment latches onto your existing garden hose and stands up – like a water spewing cobra – to provide a refreshing mist while you enjoy the weather and catch some rays.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Ping Pong Set
content: Keep the game going into the wee hours of the night with the glow in the dark ping pong set. The set reinvigorates your plain old ping pong table with all out extremely loud neon colors that come alive in the dark – beer pong anyone?

Make your little web-slinger’s dreams a reality with the Spiderman kids costume. Dressed in Spidey’s iconic red and blue spandex-like uniform, your offspring will be able to patrol the streets and keep the neighborhood safe from criminal masterminds.

Next time you need a smoke, light up by channeling the power of the music gods with the mini guitar lighter. This novelty lighter – perfect for all musicians – is modeled after an electric guitar and includes an LED that activates when you light up.

If your armpits smell like more than just “teen spirit”, then fight your offensive body odor with this iconic deodorant. Specially designed for grungy women, just a few swipes with this deodorant and you’ll be smelling like a springtime meadow.

Bolster your home’s overall security by strengthening the door’s locking mechanism with the deadbolt lock enhancer. This ingenious device is made from a super grip durable hook-and-loop fabric that wraps around the deadbolt lock to enhance its effectiveness.

Turn the most desolate beach into a five star locale with the floating cabana island. With amenities such as a wind resistant shade top, an anchor system to keep you from drifting away to another continent, and plenty of room for friends, you’ll never want the day to end.

Protect your beautiful Pontiac Aztec against idiot drivers with the car bumper protector. The protector cradles the entire back bumper with a thick foam shield – making it perfect for avoiding unsightly scratches and dents from inept parallel parkers.

Make every workday feel like paradise with the beach window sticker. Once the sticker goes up on your depressing cubicle wall, you’ll be treated to a stunning view of an uninhabited tropical island, surrounded by crystal clear water that you’ll never get to experience.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Basketball Net
content: Keep balling even after the lights get shut off at the court with the glow in the dark basketball net. The net snaps with every shot, fits any regulation size rim, and is designed to stand up against all outside weather conditions.

Magically grow taller just like your favorite vertically challenged celebrities do while seen in public places with these height increasing insoles! They’re perfect for a night out on the town when your date will be wearing high heels, and hypocritically judging you all the while.

The illuminated keychain fob is one of the most useful keychains you could ever own. Apart from lasting for a period of 10 years, the sturdy housing keeps the glow pellets inside completely safe while sunlight charges them and makes them glow for hours on end.

Light up the pavement at night when you hit the streets with the illuminated skateboard.  This eye catching board provides a smooth and responsive ride while treating you to a cool light show provided by the colored LEDs that create a truly singular aesthetic appeal.

Glide through the water like a majestic mermaid with the underwater handheld scooter. This compact device is easy to handle, and propels you through the water at two miles per hour so you can explore the ocean’s bottom at a serene pace.

Make backyard camp outs more exciting with the spaceship teepee. This space ship designed teepee is completely waterproof, extremely durable, and great for letting your kids imagination soar as they go on all sorts of interstellar missions.

Flex your brain muscles like never before when you take on the Rubik’s cube mirror puzzle. Any simpleton can solve a regular Rubik’s cube, but the mirror cube challenges you with different size cubes you have to match up without the visual aid of color.

titleEN: Han Solo Frozen In Carbonite Rug
content: Take a decorating cue from Jabba the Hutt with the lovely Han Solo frozen in carbonite rug. This polyester rug perfectly depicts the fearless Captain Han Solo trapped in carbonite – perfect for showing off to any Star Wars fan that enters your humble abode.

Turn any location in the great outdoors into your personal BBQ pit with the portable camping grill. This lightweight grill is crafted from high quality stainless steel, is simple to clean, and fits inside a compact tube for easy storage.

Make your loved one’s birthday extra special with the mutli-colored flame candles. These colorful candles are sure to upstage any cake. After being lit, the candles produces a unique flame that burns the same color as the candle.

The shark laser pointer is truly a gift for the evil genius who has it all. Each shark comes equipped with a frickin’ laser beam attached to its head! It’s great for pointing at stuff and/or heating up prey – because every creature deserves a warm meal.

Give your offspring a glimmer of hope against nighttime terrors with the Captain America shield nightlight. The Captain has used his super strength to thrust his trusty shield into the wall and shine bright all night long.

Ensure your survival after the society collapses by supplying yourself with apocalypse survival seeds. If hunting is not an option, these survival seeds will help you cultivate a vast  bounty of home grown goods to nurse the human population back to life.

More appealing than diamonds or gold, the world’s lightest solid matter is truly a one of a kind substance. Developed by NASA scientists, this solid consists of 99.8% air – yet can tolerate extreme heat and support over 1,000 times its own weight.

Quick, get all your action figures to safety! Godzilla is loose! Coming in at 12″ tall and a whopping 27″ long, the Godzilla vinyl action figure is amazingly detailed and programmed to wreck havoc on your existing collection of toys and collectibles.

Stay alert in bad neighborhoods by having your own back with the rear view sunglasses. With a clever design straight out of a spy movie, these glasses allow you to remain vigilant of your surroundings so no can sneak up on you.

Get on the fast track to morbid obesity with the ice cream sandwich maker. No longer must you burn valuable calories getting in your car and driving to the store for some treats – instead just walk to the kitchen and munch on self-made sandwiches til you drop.

Turn yourself into a majestic flying rat when you don the pigeon mask. The mask’s realistic design covers the entire head yet is breathable and comfortable enough to wear while roaming about the city and pooping on random people’s cars.

Fire up the grill in style with the M-16 rifle lighter. This 14″ long miniature M-16 includes child safety features to keep the kids safe and utilizes refillable Butane fluid, so you can light up countless times with a pull of the trigger.

Keep the music blasting all throughout your shower or pool area with the splash proof Bluetooth speaker. Once your music device is connected, you’ll be able to enjoy clear and crisp music without worrying about a rogue water splash putting an end to the party.

Survive a day at the amusement park without killing your back from carrying junior everywhere with the baby saddle shoulder strap system. This supporting system provides a comfortable spot for your offspring to relax and enjoy the view while your hands remain free.

Relive the iconic thrilling intergalactic adventures while satisfying your required literature reading quota with the Shakespearean Star Wars book. The book retells this classic story in Iambic pentameter alongside some gorgeous Elizabethan illustrations.

Give yourself an edge without the use of performance enhancing drugs when you train with the smart sensor basketball. This full size high-tech ball features unique sensors that help assess a player’s skill set in real time – making it the ultimate coaching tool.

Nobody fears a deranged man with a chainsaw if the blades are dull – so keep your violent weapon of choice running in tip-top shape with the chainsaw sharpener tool. It sharpens in seconds while leaving each tooth sharpened at the same length and angle.

Relax in the comfort of a hammock without running the fatal risk of falling over the side with the floating swing chair. More than just stylish, the chair’s intrepid design is complemented by an over-sized plush cushion and heavy duty spring for maximum comfort.

The modern glass cereal bowl gives you a first row seat to witness your crunchy cereal become a soggy mush. This glass bowl is dishwasher safe and sports a minimalistic design that is perfect for adding a modern touch to your kitchenware.

Transfer your data doggy style by inserting the humping USB dog’s red rocket into your computer. As soon as he’s penetrated your USB slot, this frisky doggy starts humping away with reckless abandon – and he doesn’t pull out until the transfer is complete.

Study the man, the myth, the legend – his Airness – like never before with the Micheal Jordan biography. Whether you’re a Bulls fan or not, this compelling read gives readers a one of a kind in-depth account to one of basketball’s greatest players ever.

titleEN: How To Poo At Work Book
content: Taking a deuce at the workplace is an art form – and the “How to Poo at Work” book will teach you the time honored traditions of this ancient practice so you can poop while on the clock. You’ll learn everything from which stall to use and avoiding awkward encounters.

Envelop your car with the delicious aroma of cheesy pasta by hanging the mac and cheese air freshener. This novelty air freshener permeates every inch of your vehicle with the sultry aroma of a gooey bowl full of hot and steamy mac and cheese.

Prevent your kitchen from descending into total anarchy with the Ferris wheel spice rack. The charming design keeps all your spices organized and quickly at hand with an innovative Ferris wheel design that works great if you’re limited on kitchen space.

With the doggy goggles your canine friend will be able to enjoy a warm sunny day without exposing their eyes to harmful UV rays. The specially designed goggles feature an ultra wide nose bridge and a deep lens that protects the eyes from all external threats.

Delve deep into the minds of your favorite hip-hop group with the Wu-Tang manual. Intended to go hand in hand with their album – Enter The Wu-Tang: 36 Chambers – it serves as an introduction to the basic principles and artistry of their music.

Whosoever holds Thor’s lighting energy hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of THOR! – sort of. The mighty hammer comes with its own custom rock base and flashes and sizzles with electricity when it’s placed near metal.

Achieve inner peace during those stressful days with a few shakes of the cherry blossom tree snow globe. The globe depicts a picturesque spring time setting with two exquisite cherry trees that spread their blossoms every time you give the globe a good shake.

Teach your little hippie offspring how cool the swinging 60s were with the Volkswagen Bus tent.  This far out tent is officially licensed, shaped like the iconic Volkswagen Bus, and features a sturdy design that’ll provide the young whippersnappers with hours of fun.

Shave valuable minutes off your breakfast cooking routine with the rapid hardboiled egg cooker. Your time is valuable, don’t waste precious time waiting for water to boil, the egg cooker will prepare your eggs just how you like them – in twelve minutes or less.

Revamp the inside of your home by using the printed roller to create intricate wallpaper-like designs at a fraction of the cost. The roller’s innovative design makes creating lively and intricately detailed patterns on your wall as easy as moving a roller up and down.

Strike terror in the heart of any crime fighter when you come at them wearing the voice changing Bane mask. While the mask won’t give you his incredible strength or fighting skills, it will make you sound and look quite intimidating – and that’s all that really matters.

Stop guesstimating how drunk you are – now you can know exactly how much alcohol is infused in your bloodstream with the smartphone breathalyzer. The device gives you a convenient means of accurately reading of your blood alcohol level on your phone.

Share your narcissistic selfies on a whole new level with the smartphone instant film printer. This portable printer lets you instantly print the pictures you take with your smartphone, so all your friends can have their very own <del>dick pic</del> duck-face picture of you.

Stay alert for possible undead threats while driving by adhering the objects in mirror are zombies decal to your driver side mirror. The sticker provides a good laugh while also reminding you to remain aware for brain-hungry zombies lurking about the streets.

Awe at the majesty of our solar system over breakfast with these planetary plates. Perfect for eating off of your Uranus – this set of melamine plates each measure ten inches across and feature a high quality image of our solar system’s neighboring planets.

Keep your furry friend afloat in menacing fashion with the shark fin doggie swim vest. Your canine buddy can now swim freely around the entire beach while simultaneously scaring surrounding beach goers with the frightening shark fin on top.

Keep your home at the perfect temperature at all times by installing the wi-fi smart thermostat. This high-tech gadget is connects to your home’s wi-fi so it can adjust the temperature settings from the convenience of your smartphone, tablet, or PC.

Survive any unfavorable situation the post-apocalyptic world throws your way with the tactical tomahawk. With this compact heavy duty  tool in your utility belt,  you’ll have a multitude of tools at your disposal to help you out of any sticky situation you find yourself in.

Clean out the potato chip and cheeto puff dust from your keyboard with ease using the colorful electronics cleaning putty. Available in one of four vivid colors, this eco-friendly wonder putty ensures your keyboard ends up as clean and dirt free as the day you got it.

Welcome your new feline overlords into your home by presenting them with the triple tiered cat bed. The design of the bed makes it ideal to use in areas where space is limited, as it provides your cats with three beds – each with a unique look and feel.

Fashion yourself like a time travelling spaceship in the cutest way possible with the Doctor Who dress. This trendy garment sports the iconic blue police call box the Doctor uses to travel through space and time, and is a must have for any die-hard Whovian.

Rule the skies with the turn of the century inspired Wright brothers plane kite. Thanks to renowned kite artist Joel Sholz, you can now take to the skies with a truly unique kite that commemorates one of mankind’s greatest achievements.

titleEN: Rude Hand Gestures Of The World
content: Ensure your next overseas trip goes off without a hitch by studying up on how to offend the locals with the rude hand gestures of the world book.  Now no matter where you travel to, you’ll be able to defend yourself when someone tries to besmirch your good name.

The original Swiss Army watch is the complete package. It delivers the reliability you’ve come to expect from Swiss Army products in a sleek, stylish, and understated design that works for every occasion from picnics to black tie affairs.

Take your b-ball skill from the courts to the country club with the basketball golf balls. These regulation size and weight golf balls come styled like basketballs, so you can easily identify your ball right away from the rest of the dull white balls.

Achieve an even tan along your backside while you enjoy a good read with the face down tanning chair. The special opening on the chair allows you to comfortably lay face down without having to deal with sand getting on all over your face.

Transport yourself to a eternal state of slumber with the Doctor Who TARDIS duvet. It features a stylish blue police call box design emblazoned on the front and includes matching pillow cases that complete the look. It’s just what the Doctor ordered.

Create intriguing ice cubes designed to keep your drink extra cold with the frozen peas ice mold. Taking a cue from mother nature, the mold resembles a pea pod that has been customized to make spherical ice cubes you can squeeze out with one hand.

Keep your fat wad of C-notes as crisp as the day they came off the press with the invisible money clip. It’s easy to use, simply peel and stick the money clip onto the bill while two magnets ensure the cash stays neatly folded and crumple free.

Learn to appreciate the finer things in life by relaxing on the inflatable floating island. This floating slice of heaven provides multiple spots to lay out and soak up some rays in addition to a spacious lounge area with room for the whole gang.

Provide some humor to your newborn Treekie offpsring’s more unpleasant moments by dressing him/her up in the Star Trek baby onesie. This snug onesie features a 3 button crotch for easy access and makes the ideal baby shower gift of Trekkies.

Achieve security through obscurity at the beach by keeping your valuables safe from thieves in the secret compartment suncreen. What seems like an inconspicuous sunscreen bottle is actually a secret storage container for your keys, cash, and ID.

Turn any location you visit into an impromptu campsite with the ultra portable sleeping bag. Apart from being lightweight, the sleeping bag features a unique design that allows it to be bundled into a packet small enough to fit in the palm of your hand.

Let the friendly neighborhood web-slinger keep the night goblins away with the 3D Spider-Man hand night light. Good ol’ Petey has broken through the walls to shoot his sticky web of light at any night time monster lurking in the dark corners of the room.

Times are a changing. The seemingly infallible Clapper technology has been de-throned, as we now have the touch LED lampshade which allows us to illuminate our home with one simple touch, no cheesy clapping or antiquated flicking required.

For smokers, there’s no better way to protect your phone than with the iPhone lighter case. The case contains a small built in lighter that requires no flame or fuel so even if you forget your actual lighter – or it runs out of gas – you can still light up.

Create the ultimate party atmosphere in your home by having the laser lamp running at all times. This compact lamp fits comfortably in the palm of your hand and emits bright lasers that turn any environment into a chic place to hang out.

Put your patience and artistic concentration skills to the ultimate test by taking on the expert level coloring book. The book offers page after page of mind blowing and incredibly intricate designs that result in stunning masterpieces upon completion.

Update your status or take an action selfie without dropping your phone with help from the smartphone bike mount. The mount easily attaches to the handlebar of the bike and secures the phone onto it while allowing you to view the screen.

Come and warm yourself by a glow that never ends, that no rainy or windy camping spell could ever put out with the “Light of the Fire” two person tent! The tent features lockable storage pockets to protect valuables and mesh windows for extra ventilation and light.

Create a stunning backdrop with the floating lighted pool fountain. The fountain floats freely around the pool, filling the atmosphere with stunning multicolored water shows while also creating mesmerizing kaleidoscope effects below the water’s surface.

Speak your mind without uttering a word with the WTF button. Every press of this over-sized big red button reveals a hilarious rendition of the famous WTF saying, so that no matter how fucked things may seem, you can bring levity to any situation.

Pop off the next round of drinks in one quick swoop with the .50 caliber bottle opener. This custom bottle opener is made out of a decommissioned .50 BMG machine gun bullet so it’s super sturdy and makes an ideal gift for alcoholics and gun nuts alike.

Prevent yourself from turning into roadkill while jogging at night with the clip on heel lights. These sleek lights won’t weigh you down one bit while they attach to the heel of each shoe and emit a bright orange LED light to keep you safe when training outdoors.

When space is limited, the world’s smallest laptop charger will keep your computer powered without any of the inconvenient bulk. Compatible with most popular brands, this tiny charger provides 65 watts while easily fitting in any pocket or small purse.

Solve your fly problem once and for all with the salt firing shotgun. The shotgun works with regular table salt and holds up to 50 rounds so you can annihilate every pesky house fly in one murderous evening. It also works great for violently seasoning your food!

Turn your fuzzy feline or canine friend into a mythical hybrid woodland creature with the sheep pet costume. The costume is easy to put on and won’t make them feel uncomfortable – at least not physically – while walking down the street with their eccentric owner.
